definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: shall there be evil in a city, and the LORD hath not done it?
sentences.chinese: 灾祸若临到一城，岂非耶和华所降的吗。

sentences.english: Does no one want to know the truth here, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 岂非这里没有人想了解真相吗，阿切尔先生？

sentences.english: Do not those who plot evil go astray?
sentences.chinese: 谋恶的，岂非走入迷途吗？

sentences.english: Can't you make the rent cheaper?
sentences.chinese: 岂非房租不能廉价些吗？

sentences.english: Can it absolutely be sixty-two years ago that I first saw you?
sentences.chinese: 咱们首次相遇，岂非真的是六十二年前吗？

sentences.english: It would make our lives so much simpler.
sentences.chinese: 如此以来，我们的生活岂非简单许多？

sentences.english: Can it really be sixty-two years ago that I first saw you?
sentences.chinese: 我们首次相遇，岂非真的是六十二年前吗？

sentences.english: Do not those who plot evil go astray? But those who plan what is good find love and faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 谋恶的岂非走入迷途吗？谋善的必得慈爱和诚实。
岂非与“保存自己”相矛盾？

sentences.english: If that person can't figure out who are you, aren't you just asking for trouble?
sentences.chinese: 要是人家想不出或猜不着你是谁，岂非自讨没趣？

sentences.english: But since all exists by your light, are you not the creator of the world?
sentences.chinese: 既然一切因你的光而存在，你岂非造物主？

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
not as good as/not equal to/inferior
that being the case/then/in that case
